<map name="1940708" theme="prism" version="tango"><topic central="true" text="Extreme Escape - Stone Oak" id="1"><topic position="401,-75" order="0" id="2"><text><![CDATA[• Address: 434 N Loop 1604 W Ste. 1204 San Antonio Texas 78232 United States
• Phone: (210) 402-3722
• Website: https://www.extremeescape.com/stone-oak
• Email: stoneoak@extremeescapesa.com

The adventure of the escape has actually involved Stone Oak San Antonio.
It's time to get off the couch and enter an escape room that puts
players in the middle of exciting scenarios they've never ever seen
prior to.
Our escape room journeys are ensured to obtain your pulse racing as you
work to resolve clues prior to time runs out. When you're inside the
totally immersive themed setup you'll need to make use of teamwork,
critical thinking and imagination to evade foes and escape the room
while there's still time.
